Ported from AlmostTI
by Marat Fayzullin
http://fms.komkon.org

No ROM image was found on your SD card. A ROM (Read Only Memory) image file contains the original software (written by Texas Instruments) that runs the operating system of this calculator. At the request of Texas Instruments, a ROM image file is no longer included with this app. It\'s illegal to distribute these ROM image files without permission because they contain copyrighted code.

Do not ask us for ROM images. TI has specifically requested that we do not distribute them. The only way to legally obtain a ROM image is to download it from your own calculator.

That procedure is described here: http://supware.net/roms

Once you have obtained this ROM image, copy it to your SD card with the name %s.
No ROM was found on your SD card. help
Keep phone screen on until calculator goes to sleep?
Remove stylish border around edge of screen for bigger buttons?
Please ask your question below. Before asking a question, please see if it is already answered on the Andie Graph FAQs.
